name: ZX-Life
description:
Generated .TAP file for the ZX Life blog series https://www.zxspectrumplus2.com/series/zx-life

Github project for this series: https://github.com/zxspectrumplus2/gameoflife

A developer diary of sorts, chronicling some public learning and an approach to software development for the ZX Spectrum. My first attempt so don't expect anything.
